entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Soft Keyboard Input Mode doesn't work on .NET MAUI Blazor 8.0.3 (Android) #19066
  • ListView + Rotation = no data view before returning to the app #19065
  • [iOS] Item Sizing Strategy Gallery currently doesn't display items consistently. #19064
  • iOS Background Task is not getting executed in every 15 min time #19063
  • FontFamily is not recognized in Unpackaged application in net 8 #19061
  • Make SetCurrent / SetImplementation calls public #19057
    Backlog
  • TapGestureRecognizer.Tapped event not triggered on certain controls #19056
  • [Android] Unable to set Button CornerRadius to 0 #19052
    Backlog
  • [UITEST] ScrollView Enable Legacy Tests #19051
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [UITEST] CollectionView Enable Legacy Tests #19050
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Equals sign (`=`) no longer valid in a project name with .net8.0 #19043
  • Shell switching page problem #19042
  • Can't compile on Mac #19039

Closed

  • UnFocus does not work on Entries inside CollectionView. #19032
  • [regression/7.0.81] Strange padding problem using grid #16598
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • BindingExpression.Apply null reference crash #19020
  • [WinUI] ScrollView does not layout contents if they don't change in size. #14377
    Under Consideration
  • Splash screen bug #18890
  • BindableObject.SetValueCore null reference crash #19021
  • [tests] Fail on EnsureCellSizesAreCached DeviceTest iOS 15.4 and 14.5 #18985 #18986
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Entry does not lose focus on tapping outside #19062
  • ScrollView does not scroll when is inside a StackLayout #19017
  • Maps on Windows fails with "Handler not found" #19040
  • iOS : if Splashscreen is not set, Status Bar is always visible #18885
  • Unable to build with AOT enabled #18839
  • Can't Find my Vivo mobile Device (Android version 12) as a debugging device in Visual Studio Community #19049
  • Project using MultiPage migrated from Xamarin faults on MAUI - Resubmission #6024
    Backlog
  • OnIdom or StaticResource typo's create an app crash in release mode #14427
    Backlog
  • MAUI iOS Background Task Documentation missing #19041
  • Target Android Framework Not Settable Via UI #19024
  • Android App Fails in Release Build on Android 14 #19027
  • Android API 34 app startup crash #19023
  • Problem with binding native IOS Library #18909
  • Navigation page on iOS shows only blank page with images in the wrong positions #18042
  • iOS ScrollView stops working when keyboard is open #18776
  • Add PointerPressed and PointerReleased events and commands to PointerGestureRecognizer #13346
    .NET 8 SR1

PullRequests

Created

  • [tests] Ignore InputTransparencyGalleryTests matrix of UITests #19060
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Android] Allow setting Button CornerRadius to 0 #19059
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Fix flaky ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly test #19047
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main) #18953
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • [tests] Add the default dotnet path on iOS #19058
    area/testing
  • Revert "Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache" #18988
    area/testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 8 SR1
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing
  • Disconnect property changes from all pages when TabbedPage set to null #18458
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Avoid possible crash using essentials Battery #18386
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix for button cornerradius 0 on android #18959
    community ✨
